Reviews.Title: Good television at a good price
Reviews.Author: Adam Blomfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this television to use as a computer monitor and was disappointed at first when I used an HDMI connection. The picture was fuzzy and not clear at all. I hooked it up using a VGA cable at the same resolution (1920 x 1080 or 1080p) and got much better quality. It confused me because I thought the digital signal would be better than analog, but it works!

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Frank.L
Reviews.Content: The thing I like most about this TV is that it has a lot of inputs for its size.  There's no DVI input of any sort in here, but there ARE 3 hdmi ports, a coaxial, a usb port, an AV input AND separate Component input, AND a VGA port, AND both input and output stereo jacks (the standard ones on pretty much all mp3 players--I'm not sure what they're called).The sound on this TV is atrocious, and yes, I have heard much better sound quality on smaller LED HDTV's--namely, my 21.5" Samsung 120Hz LED HDTV. Even my Samsung's sound quality is only acceptable for me, given that sound for small TV sets generally sound horrible, but especially when I compare it to this Sceptre TV.  However, I'm not too bothered about sound quality here, since I can hook it up to much better sound systems.In any case, the picture quality on this Sceptre is pretty good in my opinion, which brings me to the second major flaw of this TV.  The second major flaw (second to the sound quality of this set) is that....you absolutely can not dim the backlight for this TV.  No matter how I much I explored its menu, I just couldn't find its backlight dimming/brightness increasing capability. There's one option in the menu, which is "brightness" under the "picture" option, but all it did was control how much extra "whiteness" it added to the picture. Which reminds me, this Sceptre's menu is really quite bad and confusing...but it is still navigable.  Just, you will have to take a longer time learning it.  Anyway, I called customer support, but after 10 or so minutes, they concluded that the E243BV was not backlight-adjustable.  Obviously, I wasn't very happy, but I couldn't do anything about it, either.Other than that setback, I actually think the picture quality is not bad, despite some reviews saying the colors look washed out.  I'm no expert when it comes to any display technology's picture quality, but I find that if you're looking for "richer colors", just set the "brightness" to 0 and the "contrast" and "color" to whatever you want it to be.  When brightness is set to 0, the colors look pretty good and don't really look washed out to me.  One last thing that kind of dings the TV a little, but isn't a major problem, is that the power cable is actually part of the TV, so you can't take it out and replace it.Anyway, my favorite thing about this TV is that it has so many inputs for its size, which is why I ultimately gave it a 4 star rating (after weighing it with the acceptable picture quality, very poor sound quality, and absence of backlight-adjusting capability).5/3/2013 UPDATE:I bought this TV set when it was a little under $130 total.  Sure, my review was favorable, but that was because I assumed this TV would continue to be around the price it was when I bought it (if not, slightly more expensive) when I wrote my review.  Now, this TV set seems to range from $190-$200.  In this case, I would really recommend some other brands like Samsung, LG, or Vizio, rather than Sceptre, because $190-200 seems pretty overpriced for the overall quality to me; whereas Samsung, Vizio, and LG's overall quality is pretty good for their typical price.  My suggestion would be to buy this TV set when it's around $140-150 or lower.

Reviews.Title: Cheap TN panel = viewing angle is limited
Reviews.Author: Yiqun Li
Reviews.Content: It is good as a monitor or if most time you are face to face towards it. But it is not so good as a TV, the image is pretty bad when look from side ways.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Option for my Daughter's bedroom
Reviews.Author: A. J. Minhas "althotos"
Reviews.Content: First of all, my daughter loves it. I set it up on a weekend when she was away to surprise her when she came back. In reading the reviews, I knew the sound was going to be tinny due to the size and manufacture of the TV set. This problem has since been remedied by a pair of Logi Tech external speaker for about 20 dollars. However, this little TV has a pretty decent picture and great color contrast. I get over the air HDTV for the local channels and we have a Roku XD, which can stream full 1080p into this TV. Both sources worked great and look great. For one and a half clams, this was not a bad bargain. I recommend it as a secondary or tertiary unit, but probably not as a primary unit. Definitely delivered on the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E243BV-HD 23" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: P. Gilman "lovin' the tunes"
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time.  The color, no matter how we try to adjust it, looks washed out.  You have to sit directly in front of the screen in order for it to look okay.  The speakers in the TV sound tinny.  My old small Panasonic TV was much better than this!  Disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Great Value for a Flashy Montior
Reviews.Author: R. Amaral "Rice Cooker"
Reviews.Content: This is a great value for an LED monitor with free shipping that is fast!  Even to Hawaii! The pink color was a knockout for the girls! The resolution quailty is just as good with outputs for HDMI (4), VGA, Cable, Audio even SPDIF. There are inputs for, RCA (Playstation 3 or XBOX 360), single Video, Audio, Headphone and even a YPBPR connection for older analog devices! Use it as a PC monitor or a TV take your pick with the price and size makes this monitor a great value! The color selections are great as well!

Reviews.Title: Good picture horrible sound
Reviews.Author: Sleuthier
Reviews.Content: Tv has a good picture, has good input options (multiple hdmi inputs) and it is super light. Only problem is that the speakers literally sound terrible. I honestly expected tinny speakers from a tv this size- however these were impressively below anything I would've thought possible. It's like the engineer designing this tv was presented with the challenge of creating a tv with the worst possible sound (and was successful).I came really close to returning it but then found the maxell speaker/stand which dramatically improved the situation.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Xray_Man
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to give it 3.5 stars, but sided to the 4 because of price.  I put this in my bathroom, replacing a 2003-era LCD TV.  That TV had great sound, but horrible picture quality.  I got this TV for under a hundred bucks.  Keeping this in mind, the sound is horrible but the picture quality is decent.  You can adjust the sound with the EQ to actually sound acceptable.  The image is slightly washed, but that was only after reading a previous review that I noticed.  Otherwise I would not have noticed.  Another item of note is the weight.  This TV is so light!All in all, it is a decent TV.  If I had paid double the price, I would be upset.  Again, for under a hundred bucks shipped to my house, not a bad buy.  If you are expecting Sony quality, look elsewhere.PS- This is my second Sceptre TV.  My other is a 46" HDTV.  After 3 years, works great considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Anything in PINK is Great!
Reviews.Author: miaming
Reviews.Content: The TV sounds and views like a computer but other than thaaat I really like it. I bought it for my girls (toddlers) and they LOVE IT! They screamed when they saw it. Easy hook up. However, the TV is very light weight and my kids can be extremely rough sooo... keep it OUT OF REACH of children! Also I LOVE that it is so compatible with games, cable, internet, USB lines, etc, etc, that's where it scores all the points! 2 big & 4 little thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Children
Reviews.Author: L. Coleman "Geek Girl"
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for children especially since the price is right. I got this TV to give as a gift for a little girl who was moving back with her mother for the first time in years. She was getting her very own room that was decked out in pink and this TV was perfect for her new room. She loved it and it works fine. I think the picture quality is pretty good for the price that I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Great little set!
Reviews.Author: CREED
Reviews.Content: I bought this pink tv for my daughter and she loves it. It's a nice size for her room and shows a very nice high quality picture. I would say its an excellent choice for kids room, bath room, kitchen, or a small office. The price was pretty good also. Bang for Buck!

Reviews.Title: My second one
Reviews.Author: Bee Jay "All things Amazon"
Reviews.Content: I really do like these Sceptre TVs, especially for the price. I like the look, and picture quality to me is good. I know people complain about the tinny speakers. I just added some nice computer speakers I had. I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Greater price
Reviews.Author: Marolyn L. Dowdy
Reviews.Content: This was an unbelievalbe value for a 1080 LED television!  It arrived quickly and in excellent condiition.  The picture quality is as great as one would expect.  I am enjoying viewing it!

Reviews.Title: Great picture and great price
Reviews.Author: Dennis R Kief
Reviews.Content: For barely $100 this TV is great. The picture is great and it has 3 hdml inpiut jacks. The only slight negative is the sound quality, a little bit tinny sounding.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: AMartin
Reviews.Content: for my 9 year old its perfect! goes great with her room and it is a pearl pink. the price is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Value for Money...Versatile can be used as TV as well as Monitor
Reviews.Author: MKB
Reviews.Content: Initially when I placed the order I was a bit sceptical as I was not sure of the quality. But to my surprise the TV turned out to be really good in terms of clarity and sharpness. Due to the 24 inch size I can use it both as a TV as well as a Monitor. I found it a great value for Money. Also, I liked the fact that the packaging came with a screw-driver and a TV cleaning cloth which are really handy.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Ljc
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV for my back room to use with a antena because Dish goes out during storms.  This TV was a great price, has a excellent picture.  My brother wanted one but the price went up so he decided to wait. Very please with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: as expected
Reviews.Author: Ted Menard
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time.  Easy set up if you can read.  Good picture all around on all settings.  We have directv, and the channels all look good including the HD.  sound is a bit tinny, but it is in a bedroom that is 11X17.  Plenty of volume for the room.  Would I order another one?  NO!  But I will be ordering a larger model of the same brand.  The low price does not reflect the overall good quality.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lourdes Hallenbeck
Reviews.Content: The television is better than expected for the price, great picture, sounds is good. Getting another set soon! Very good quality

Reviews.Title: Perfectly Pink
Reviews.Author: Customer2011
Reviews.Content: The Television came ahead of schedule, packaged securely, and neat. The TV has a good picture easy to operate, and a easy instruction manual to follow. If I could offer two suggestions it would be to improve the sound quality-customers will pay more for better sound, and the remote should match the color of the television-pink. A person who buys a pink tv does not want a black remote control.

Reviews.Title: poor sound
Reviews.Author: Galo Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The sound is so poor that even at maximun level is hard to understand as close as 8 feet, it sounds like my grandma 60 year old radio.

Reviews.Title: Love this tv
Reviews.Author: Lucky girl
Reviews.Content: It's a great tv great picture great color easy assembly quick delivery plan to buy a second one ! This tv has only been used in my 3 yr old daughters room as a TV can't comment on how it shows as a computer monitor .

Reviews.Title: Kids Playroom
Reviews.Author: Hyser
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife's daycare. Works as it should with our home server using Roku and Plex. Try it you'll like it!

Reviews.Title: Sound is absolutely terrible.
Reviews.Author: dbrrr0
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great but the sound even after trying to adjust it is terrible.  I would not buy this again for that very reason.

Reviews.Title: Versital
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I was actually look for a good sized computer monitor.  This was less money than monitors of equal size.  It has worked out great.  I use it as a monitor by day, and it functions as good as any monitor I have.  At night, if we have company it is moved to the needed room for their entertainment.  As a tv it functions great.  It was an excellent purchase for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: A. D. Spangler
Reviews.Content: The picture is good.  The sound is clear but - when I walk on my treadmill I would like more volume.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Lafitte1212
Reviews.Content: Cheal price and just a so so TV. I would not buy another. Just don't like it that much. The sound is not good at all.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: r0ger risoldi
Reviews.Content: can't beat the price for a 1080 tv. needed to adjust the settings, but overall its a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: good tv for low cost
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: this tv  is a good tv for a low cost  if you need a 2nd tc foe bedroom it good for that

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing sound output
Reviews.Author: mckaylively
Reviews.Content: I wanted to purchase two Coby LEDTV2326 23-inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTVs as Christmas gifts for my children.  However, Amazon limited me to one of the Cobys, so I ended up settling for this Sceptre at the same price as the Coby.  I say that I settled for this TV because it is subpar when compared to the Coby, in every respect.  (1) The picture quality is lacking.  It is not clear, sharp, or bright.  I've adjusted the settings, but to no avail.  (2)  Worse than the picture is the fact that the sound output is very weak.  The volume is too low to hear at a volume setting lower than half.  However, when set much higher that that the volume becomes so loud that it's muffled.  I have also adjusted the volume settings, with no improvement.  In comparison, the Coby was fully functional and required no settings adjustments right out of the box.  I would not recommend this TV, nor would I purchase it again.  I recommend the Coby.

Reviews.Title: This is a piece of CRAP! Sound is AWFUL!
Reviews.Author: Belle-Michele "Belle-Michele"
Reviews.Content: My son meant well when he got me the E243RV for Christmas- I'm just sorry he got rid of my perfectly good TV for this piece of crap.The sound is horrible, just horrible!I've been told I have to invest in a tuner and or speakers to get decent sound...why?Crap, this is CRAP!I hate it.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted for my kitchen/familyroom.
Reviews.Author: Richard P
Reviews.Content: I researched this tv and originally bought it from NewEgg.  Sceptre has a good reputation as a maker of Computer monitors.  It failed within three days.  Looked like the power supply fuse blew on an overload.  Consumers can't fix this kind of fault.  I sent it back.I still wanted it.  When Amazon had it at a good price, I still wanted it and bought it.It has been performing flawlessly so far.I should mention that Amazon  also price matched it later for a refund.

Reviews.Title: It works OK
Reviews.Author: FXYFH
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my relative who's visiting temporarily. I'm looking for a secondary TV and not for long-term use, and this TV fits the bill given the relatively low price at the time of purchase (low $100-ish).With this TV, you get what you pay for - it's a "value" TV, meaning, it does its job, but don't expect to get a super high-quality picture. I didn't try the digital feature, but the analog looks acceptable. It's not as sharp and the color is a bit washed out, but it may just have something to do with the setting.Keep in mind that this is not Sony, Samsung, Sharp, or those top brand TVs, thus do set a lower expectation, and you'll be happy. This will be a good TV for temporary use, for the kids, kitchen, or for one you'd use sparingly (or if you're still in college).I got the red one, only because this color was what's on-sale. Surprisingly, the color doesn't look too bad at all. The remote also looks good, and it works OK too.Good luck with your research and purchase!

Reviews.Title: Horrible LED lit lcd.
Reviews.Author: TheXX7
Reviews.Content: I hooked up to the xbox 360 and it was a horrible quality picture. Not only that but there was a line going across it every couple of seconds. I then tried a movie, even worse. Very dark, definitely not LED lit. I returned it ASAP Rocky style. Never will I purchase Sceptre again. If I never had an LCD HDTV before I would probably think this was how it is suppose to be. So for all you newcomers to buying an hdtv, do not buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my needs!
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: My home office is a small bedroom and this 23 inch combo TV/CD player is perfect for the room. Picture is solid and easy to watch in any light.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Driven mad
Reviews.Content: Bought this because I needed a white tv of that size.  The resolution was not brilliant, better with high definition activated.  Pretty little tv, and works fine in a guest room.

Reviews.Title: Save your money and buy somthing else.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for 8 hours and I just wasn't satisfied. The colors were washed out, and the brightness was terrible. The overall quality wasn't there. Save your money for something better.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Mary W.
Reviews.Content: So far this TV is working great !  The reviews said the volume was not the best, and on some channels it does have to be up to the max on volume, but I can deal with that, cause it is just some channels which makes me think it is more the stations then the TV.  Am very happy with this TV so far.. I use it almost every day !

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Richard C.
Reviews.Content: I did not have high expectations for a TV this size at such a low price, and the reviews did not exactly inspire confidence, but I am very happy with this TV! I got it for my kitchen, and it was a perfect choice for this location. The picture is excellent--it's unusual to get 1080p at this screen size--and I have no complaints about the sound quality. I could see using this in a bedroom or den. Absolutely worth the money! Do yourself a favor: since you're saving so much on the price of the TV, if you plan to mount this to a wall spend a little extra on a good-quality wall mount. The cheap one I bought took a lot of the excitement out of this.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: jim m.
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased for a friend and he loves it.  I wanted a not so expensive TV to give as a gift and settled on the Sceptre 23 inch.  Surprisingly when I visited him and saw the picture quality I was rather impressed.  I would definitely purchase another one in the future.

Reviews.Title: The Chrome 23'
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I saved quite a bit. The TV works fine, the color is good, it arrived fine, is 1080 pixel etc. I still haven't found a catch. I guess chrome was just an unpopular color when I bought it, because all the other colors were $50+ more.

Reviews.Title: The sound is not good
Reviews.Author: Leelee
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my granddaughter for Christmas.  I have to keep the sound on 100 in order to hear it.

Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: forest ball
Reviews.Content: excellent hdtv for the price! picture quality and easy to navigate. i would definately recommend to my friends.great for bedroom /etc.

Reviews.Title: Yep, the poor sound quality is an issue
Reviews.Author: Brian Schwartz "Author Publisher Expert"
Reviews.Content: I didn't head the warnings of the other reviewers. But can attest that the sound quality on this TV is horribly bad. It sounds like it's playing through a tin can.  I guess I didn't think that would be a big deal, but it is once you start using it.And while there is a headphone out jack (which I thought I could use to connect to a better sound system), there is a constant low-volume buzz when you use it, it's what we are doing now to get better sound, but eventually that low-hum buzz drives you nuts.The picture quality is good - so this will probably end up being a computer monitor once I replace it.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted..........
Reviews.Author: Jeanene
Reviews.Content: The description of this product stated "used, some damage".  When it came, the only damage was a tear in the box.  The television is beautiful and plays great!  The color is awesome and our daughter loved it!  I would definitely recommend this tv to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: JGB
Reviews.Content: Let's face it: if you want a fancy home theater system you are going to spend money to get it. If you just want a TV that will play your entertainment on a nice screen without taking up a lot of space, this is what you want! The price is great and it has plenty of ports for anything you'd want to connect to it. I use this with a Roku and am perfectly happy with it.The sound: I read many people complaining about the sound on this unit. I do not ever expect theater quality sound straight from a TV, especially a low-price TV! However I find the sound on this unit to be perfectly adequate as-is, but if you really want a higher quality sound experience, just get some speakers and plug them in.It would be nice if the included stand would hold the TV straight instead of tilting slightly back, but this is not enough of an issue for me to lower my rating.This TV was extremely easy to setup and I would certainly buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Annette Medina "Annette Medina"
Reviews.Content: Thought this was going to be a bit smaller than what it is has great picture could have better sound but works just fine for the use I need it for.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Happy Reader
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a TV for the kitchen, and this is the perfect size.  The picture is great and it was easy to set up and use.  I was hoping it would be a brighter red, but then I want everything bright red.  Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Sounds is dismally inadequate for a television
Reviews.Author: Norm Smith
Reviews.Content: Overall quality of the television and picture are great. However, built-in speakers sound like a tiny transistor radio. Not good even enough for just using as a kitchen TV. Should have listened to the reviews that already mentioned bad speakers. Even though I got an excellent deal, still returning this for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Bodily
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my sons' room and it's been working great, so far.  I read the reviews before purchasing this TV and saw many people describe the sound as "tinny".  However, I haven't noticed anything wrong with the sound thus far.  I will say, when you turn up the volume on the TV, there is a bit of a resonant quality to it, but nothing that I would consider "tinny".  I say for the price, this TV is perfect for small spaces!

Reviews.Title: DON"T BUY SCEPTRE T.V.'s
Reviews.Author: Chris V
Reviews.Content: This t.v. broke after 1 yr, and 2 mos. just after the lousy 1yr, warranty expired.  DON"T BUY SCEPTRE T.V.'s now out $185. DON'T BUY CHEAP you're wasting your money. If you want to buy cheap don't go below Sarp.

Reviews.Title: good tv with a clear picture.
Reviews.Author: Amanda S.
Reviews.Content: This tv would have gotten 5 stars but the sound quality is a little lacking. We purchased this tv for my pre-teen daughter and also purchased a set of jbl speakers to help boost the sound. The picture is amazing, the size is perfect for her room and she loves the midnight blue color. Over all, I am very happy with this purchase. I would recommend this item to others but again, advise that external speakers are needed for good sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: Not the best  sound or picture wish I got a larger screen so I could mount it on the wall

Reviews.Title: Great extra TV
Reviews.Author: Sondra
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our son's room.  With the HDMI ports, it is great for his games and cable as he can keep them all plugged in and simply change imputs from the remote.  i would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazon did it again.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: The Tv was just right for me, Colour, Size and everything. I love it. Good job Amazon, you are always on time.

Reviews.Title: It lasted 2 days
Reviews.Author: Mare
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a Christmas gift for my 10 yr old. Hooked it up to the Wii so she can view Netflix. The sound was very tinny. After 2 days the video went out. I called Sceptre and they recommended I return it to Amazon. Amazon was very helpful. Although I threw the box away this morning, theyll reimburse me for getting it packed and email a shipping label. Inconvienient, but Amazons cust svc is great. Im going to upgrade to a better tv this time.

Reviews.Title: Love the colors!
Reviews.Author: Pixie
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is a little on the cheap side, but it is cheap so thats expected. I LOVE that you can get these in colors! I ordered the red one and its sooo much cuter then a regular black tv. I just wish they had bigger sizes. These are too small for a living room but perfect for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Ruben Orillac
Reviews.Content: Excellent price. Ideal size for walking closet or bathroom. Light and modern look. I will recommend it strongly. Best buy.

Reviews.Title: hey we enjoy it
Reviews.Author: blondlockx
Reviews.Content: GREAT price for a entertainment piece.We love it more so the price was right.I shopped around and your price was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Cindy D.
Reviews.Content: Works better than the Visio I paid twice as much for.  Works well  as a security camera monitor, computer monitor, as well as a tv.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Sceptre makes an excellent television
Reviews.Author: V. Myers
Reviews.Content: I have another one of these TV's, so I bought this one for the kitchen.  It looks great...I have a red one and the dark blue looks great in my kitchen.  I like that they offer colors.  The picture is beautiful.  Reception is excellent with an amplified rabbit ear over the air antenna.  I get over 60 free stations.  The sound is a bit tinny but not as bad as some small flat screen TV's.  For the price it is an excellent TV.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 23-inch review
Reviews.Author: sheila brenner
Reviews.Content: I never like being negative in a review, but while this TV is a great size and the picture is good, the sound is horrible.  It's tinny and the audio sounds like it coming from down the hall.  I've tried adjusting it repeatedly, but to no avail.  If you don't mind terrible sound and I am not picky about these sorts of things, you might wish to go with another brand or listen to your possible new purchase in the store and not buy online.

Reviews.Title: Great tv but...
Reviews.Author: Christine M. Seidel
Reviews.Content: The Picture is great but the sound quality kinda sucks. I live in low income housing and always am hearing kids running around and screaming outside, as well as my son inside. It might be an ok tv for someone single with no kids and doesn't have a lot of outside noise coming in through the walls, but with someone that has extra noise, I would recommend investing in some extra speakers to hook up and it's not just this tv model, I also have a 32 inch Sceptre and that tv sound quality also kinda sucks. And just a heads up with the warranty, Sceptre covers the first year of ownership even if you bought a warranty to go along with it and the Sceptre are a little difficult to deal with and get a hold of and it can take several weeks to a month to get your tv back because they do not come to you, they make you ship it to them at no cost to you of course, but it can be annoying.

Reviews.Title: No concerns
Reviews.Author: Janay "Janay"
Reviews.Content: Because of the reviews, I was worried about looking at the picture from a side angle, especially since this was for my kitchen. From all angles, this is a GREAT TV. That review was wrong. I own(ed) a lot of TVs. This was a great price for a really GREAT TV. One thing, for the HD, you need the box, but that's okay with me. It took about a half hour to upload all the channels from Verizon ... just plugged it into the cable box and waited. Then it looked and looks great, works great, and I am extremely happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Catherine J Clare "BZGAL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for the kitchen at work.  We use a converter box because we dont have cable.  The picture is very good but the sound is only average.

Reviews.Title: Can't hear it
Reviews.Author: Nicola E. Hebert
Reviews.Content: I can't believe this is a TV that is reduced from $500. The speakers on this TV are terrible! They sound like bad computer speakers. I would definitely reconsider purchasing if you want quality sound. I bought this for my daughters room and guess I will have to shop for a sound bar now... :(

Reviews.Title: bad sound
Reviews.Author: george l turner
Reviews.Content: the sound is low even with full volume, the picture is good with good color, the stand lacks versatility can't move in any way

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: eight08trapps
Reviews.Content: so far so good did not really get to utilize the tv that much. the main problem with this tv is the internal speakers, it is honestly worthless but even before ordering tv i had a surround sound system set up. love the size it is perfect for my garage especially the amount of hdmi and outputs.

Reviews.Title: scepter tv
Reviews.Author: Big Ed
Reviews.Content: ok for the price  wudnt want  anyone  else to see me  watching  it bought it  for  my  motor  home bedroom

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price...
Reviews.Author: Wayne Rose
Reviews.Content: Light, portable, ok picture for the price but sound is terrible. Must use external speakers with this tv  - the sound quality is that bad.

Reviews.Title: TV is awesome and at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: There were complaints about the audio so i was worried, but when you adjust the speakers from mono to stereo it works well for the size of TV, if you need louder than that then a good pair of computer speakers would do the trick.I have to say I am impressed with the quality from Sceptre, I bought a 32" 1080p and to this day I am impressed with the quality I got for the price I paid.This is a great TV that doubles as a monitor for regular home usage.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Diane Simpson
Reviews.Content: Color is great. HD is clear and perfect. It perfect size to sit beside my computer. And the price was best of all.

Reviews.Title: Not the best contrast.
Reviews.Author: Entomy
Reviews.Content: Anything below a certain point, is almost completely black, even if it should just be "shadowy". This makes it hard to watch videos or play games with a lot of "dark" stuff, which is way more than you'd probably think. Everything else color wise is great, but the darks are downright awfully dark. The price was very good though, I was expecting worse for what I paid.

Reviews.Title: My TV.
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: It came fast and all in one piece. I haven't used it yet because i going to put it on my enclosed porch when it warms up.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: MorganFSU
Reviews.Content: This TV is such a great deal. It has a nice picture and its such a pretty red. I got this for my daughter and she loves that its not black. It has sucha fun character and its got a great quality picture also.

Reviews.Title: Good Television with terrible speakers
Reviews.Author: Daniel B. Butler "Richmonder"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for use as a monitor and television after reading the previous reviews.  The previous reviews were correct about the bad speakers.  No amount of adjusting the treble etc will make these speakers acceptable. They really are awful. I had a cheap pair of computer usb speakers hooked up now and they provide good sound.  Since I paid only $90 for the tv, plus the added cost of $10 for the computer speakers, this tv is still an exceptional value.

Reviews.Title: Okay but I wouldn't recommended it.
Reviews.Author: Potion99 "potion"
Reviews.Content: Like everyone else said......colors is not that great, screen is in matte finish so making it even worst.  Build in speakers are only 3 watts, now I understand where others reviewers coming from but I didn't have any problem with the sound using it with Logitech Revue, only when I played Animal Planet through blu-ray player the sound are tiny and volume need to be crank up max.Bottom line I got this TV at deep discount price so it really factor in the bad and good side of it. If you don't care about tuner and only be using it with external feed, I would recommend just buy decent computer HD monitor will do a much better job.

Reviews.Title: BAD BAD TV nothing good about it
Reviews.Author: SOUTHERN HILLBILLY BEADER
Reviews.Content: This TV was the worst purchase I've made in years was so glad to return for refund . Sound on this TV 's speaker is like old transistor am radio from 60's and Spectre customer service said I need to add on sound bar or speakers that thin new Tv's were not made with quality speakers and extra purchases were required to make it work (he said you got what you paid for ) and that was that .thankfully Amazon has return policy and I am thankful. Walmart also sells this brand and lady at my store said that they had them on sale cheap and that they sold fast but were all returned even faster . Not worth a plug nickel .lesson learned Spectre is junk

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, Horrible Sound
Reviews.Author: Kristopher Ames
Reviews.Content: I mounted this Sceptre TV in my workout room right in front of the treadmill.  I figure that if I am watching a good movie or show, then I will stay on the treadmill longer and not get so bored.  The TV is a good size for my purpose, the picture quality is very good, the value was good ( paid ~113 for it )  but the sound is horrible.  Even with nothing running in the room, I can barely hear the TV and it sounds like its in Mono instead of Stereo.

Reviews.Title: Good unit for the price - you can't beat it
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Nice little compact display many hooks up no complaints so far, haven't tested out all the quality features yet, but so far ok.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: G. Bryant
Reviews.Content: Nice TV - Red color looks great in my kitchen - Only con - the volume is not loud but still a great buy

Reviews.Title: Complete Garbage
Reviews.Author: A. Cameron
Reviews.Content: Fuzzy picture and terrible sound , you get what you pay for I guess .. I ordered the Proscan instead for another $80 .. very pleased with that purchase

Reviews.Title: Is Perfect
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: I love this TV is perfect, just what I need for my roomWhat place in the room and I can watch it from anywhere, besides that everything came just as planned.I recommend it and I'm thinking of buying two more for future.

Reviews.Title: decent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: G. S. Scott
Reviews.Content: We purchased it at Christmas for our kitchen.  The sound is a little tinny.  Picture ok.  For the money though you really can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: not the greatest quality but great for the price
Reviews.Author: pavel sanchez
Reviews.Content: makes a good tv for a store or maybe kitchen tv. Tv is very thin and light. hdmi ports and good as a computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Sound too tinney
Reviews.Author: MaryEllen Dandrow
Reviews.Content: The picture was good but the sound was too tinney, like in an aluminum can. Price was good but not sound.

Reviews.Title: Good enough, not primary TV.
Reviews.Author: Leo Favrovsky
Reviews.Content: The TV looks great in red and compliment the decor of our office kitchen. However, it's display of colors is much to be desired in terms of HDTV. So as second tv, it looks great and does the job, as primary tv, I would not recommend it. It is very thin looking and arrived as promised. Just plug and play.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: PMac
Reviews.Content: I used this TV to replace another TV on a wall mount bracket.  The picture is great, I like the variety of inputs.  The sound is not great through the internal speakers, but it's very acceptable... especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: nice for show
Reviews.Author: Justkeesh
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for a two year old for watching her favorite dvds. it is perfect for what i want it for

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money.
Reviews.Author: bob barry
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a white television up to 26" and they are hard to find, so took a chance on this brand that I had never heard of.  But turns out loaded with features.  Only downside is sound quality.  However that can beremedied with an additional external speaker if need be.  For around $150 is a big bang for the buck and looksgreat.  Shipping was fast along with hook up.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't BE Better !!
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Gregory
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up, grea to watch. Picture is perfect It is in my Study and I waych it  5-6 hours per day. I couldn't be happier. I am a 79 yr old retiree and am very frugal. This was a wise investment .

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher Boss
Reviews.Content: Shipped quikcly and was very happy with the TV. For the price I got a great deal (paid about $90 for it).

Reviews.Title: Great Product at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product at a steal of a price and was expecting mediocre quality for the price paid.  I was pleasantly surprised!  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Joseph F Dunnigan
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent buy for the money. The sound needs to be improved however as it has quite a hollow sound sometimes. Otherwise we are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: ok-but
Reviews.Author: bedroomneed
Reviews.Content: pix quality ok.  sound quality poor.  size & weight great.  del. on time. price great using Amazon gift card + promotion $$$ (total=$20.52!)  initial language french!!!  stand angle tilt poor.  Moved  all-round better Magnavox set ($122/Target in person) to other bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great, cheap Flat screen!
Reviews.Author: G. Barry
Reviews.Content: I have to say I was reluctant to order based upon some of the negative reviews but they must have received lemons (and should have asked for replacements.The two major complaints I saw were picture angle/clarity and sound quality/volume. I have NO issue with either and I am an electronics and tech geek.The viewing angle is amazingly wide and the sound cranks. Sure, it's a bit tinny as with any smaller screen TV but it fills the room and is clear.I would recommend this unit at the $125 or less price any day. I may buy another and our friends are buying one for their bedroom.I hooked up an Android 4.1 HDMI mini stick and it's a perfect match!

Reviews.Title: speker quality
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Holzmeister
Reviews.Content: Speaker quality poor, not able to make adjujstments.  Stand is not able to be adjusgted  Received on time and as shown.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: LordLyons
Reviews.Content: For me, this is a great tv for a great price. Using it as my bedroom tv. Perfect size and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Good reason not to change your mind you could end up with something bad.
Reviews.Author: Davey
Reviews.Content: I was under the impression this unit was as good as new.  I was misinformed.  First because it is an HDTV there should be NO clarity issues unless the input material is not clear.  However the TV Channels, brand new DVD's and even Netflix streamed from my PC (all of which are digital and all of which should be crystal clear), they aren't.  The colors appear to be dull and regardless of how I adjust the settings I am really regretting buying this TV.  Hate to put a negative on this purchase but I should have purchased the one I put in my Cart first, but I changed my mind and am now paying the price.  I would NOT recommend this for anyone looking to buy  a new TV.  Spend a few extra dollars and be happy, not disappointed like i am.  Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Sanford
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a specific purpose. After reading reviews about the poor viewing angles and audio I decided I could live with it. It is for an RV where I will be watching it from one position and the tv will be plugged in to an external audio system.Overall I think it was well worth the money. The picture is really good after initial adjustment. As it comes, set on vivid the picture was dark and the contrast was so high that half the image was black shadows. I turned the brightness way up and the contrast way down and it looks great now. Also the viewing angle was much better than I had expected from reviews I had read. The Audio however is really, really bad. It is weak, tinny and muffled all at once. If you are planning on using it as a standalone TV you will probably be unhappy with it. Any cheap pair of computer speakers plugged in to the headphone jack would likely be a big improvement.

Reviews.Title: xmas gift for son.......enjoying it
Reviews.Author: DENNIS VERONIE
Reviews.Content: cant say much about the tv, but i do know he is enjoying it............i do know its for his outside viewing

Reviews.Title: 0 stars
Reviews.Author: AALFORD456
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my daughter's bedroom to replace a older tv. The picture was good but the sound was awful. I turned the volume up to 100 and I still had a hard time hearing it. It would work better for a computer. I shipped it back the next day.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Silvertoe
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the price. I was skeptical to buy the tv when I read a review that stated you had to watch the tv head on because you could not see it from the side. Who ever wrote that did not buy this TV. Because they were dead wrong. I bought the red 23" for $104.79 and is way better than I expected. It even came with a nice red and black screw driver to put it together. This is a must buy if you are in the need of a TV of value.

Reviews.Title: nice small tv
Reviews.Author: Robert Arnold
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv for use in a small den. The tv was easy to set up.It has very good picture and sound. A good tv for a bedroom or kids room. Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: ITS MORE LIKE A COMPUTER MONITOR THAN A TV
Reviews.Author: stephen d miles
Reviews.Content: this sceptre is more like a computer monitor than a tv...very thin , bad viewing angles....at least it has a usb and headphone out ports so you can add some better pc speakers

Reviews.Title: not worth any $$
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: cheap price,originally hated product but i guess you really couldnt get a better deal, tv works and is suitable for a bathroom or kids room

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, Perfect price
Reviews.Author: Sharon Valentine
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  Perfect size for my sewing room.Very easy to hook everything up and impressed by the 3 hdmi inputs.

Reviews.Title: got it for 100$
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: sister loved it. quality blew me away for this bran i never heard of. has multiple display ports. audio is garbage though but has a speaker hole in the back so hook it up to your sound system

Reviews.Title: decent for price
Reviews.Author: moontree
Reviews.Content: alright first of all if you don't want to adjust anything , this is not the tv for you.im using it as a monitor currently and I can tell you now it takes alot of work to get it looking properly.it does not look as good as my 2 year old computer monitor. I got this on sale for 112$ so it was a very good deal.the main issue with this television in term of picture is the coloring. it just looks off, example  the red does not look red if i put the coloring up part way the red letters only have half of it the actual red. if I turn it up the color up it just looks way too bright.but once again its not a bad tv, might take some getting use to but once again for this price its a great deal

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E243BV
Reviews.Author: K. Bibey
Reviews.Content: The television build quality feels a *little* cheap, however that's not too big considering you're not feeling your telivsion as you watch it. If you do happen to do that, that's a bit creepy.Picture quality is stunning considering it's such a little telivision.Sound quality is exceptional. Not good, but not horrible. Sound quality is just distorted sometimes and other times it's just too quiet.DVD player works as advertised.Overall, not a bad buy.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: DeAnna Lumpe
Reviews.Content: This tv is a nice little size,but the picture and sound quality is not great. The description says 1080 but it doesn't look like it. I will probably return it

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael J Janavel
Reviews.Content: Amazon offered this TV at a great discount price. I noted what the other reviews said, but wasn't worried because I really don't watch much TV on a TV set.The sound is tinny as noted previously, but when I play it through my computer's external stereo, it is very good.The biggest disappointment is that it didn't come with HD cables. In fact, if I hadn't had extra co-ax I'd still be waiting to watch the TV while I waited for them to arrive/ It would have been nice if they mentioned the lack of cables in the box.Oh, and wide ratio on the screen tends to distort the image, so I use normal.

Reviews.Title: cute tv but horrible everything else
Reviews.Author: applek730
Reviews.Content: I honestly love this tv, for the looks, in my daughters room. however, the sound is more than terrible and picture is horrendous. just slightly to the left, right, lower or over view and the picture is terrible....center (as in directly in front of) is okay but picture quality (color) isn't the greatest. I only kept this tv because it was a first tv for a 2yr old, other than that I would not recommend at all. If I could do a video review that would do the defects any justice, I would!ETA:: we have owned this tv for about 6 months. same today as day purchased.

Reviews.Title: Awewsome!
Reviews.Author: Brock Lane
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for such a great price and I have no idea how they shipped it to me so fast. Quality product.

Reviews.Title: tv the worst
Reviews.Author: Kelly Frezell
Reviews.Content: no colour, this tv is useless at any price the tv gives a very dark picture and just is no good

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Eric Nolan
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this as our x-mas present for ourselves for our bedroom. I was worried about choosing a non name brand tv but gave it a shot. My wife is very happy with the pink color. It was easy to wall mount. Picture is great. The sound is the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5. Sounds kinda tinny but that seems to be a common problem with these smaller tvs. You might want to consider a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Need to purchase addition items to use this product
Reviews.Author: kngpn1 "regular customer"
Reviews.Content: This product only comes with the flat screen and stand.  No wiring or anything to connect the product up.  I was able to get it to play and the picture looked good for the price. I am working on getting the correct wiring for this and to see if it will connect to my cable box.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a girl
Reviews.Author: J. Smith
Reviews.Content: We got this for our daughter and it's perfect for her.  Aside from the screen being small for my tastes, i actually like the menu system compared to my Sony XBR, the menu system is more similar to my Sharp Quattron.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY CAN FIND SAME DEAL THAT HAS NO PROBLEMS
Reviews.Author: jlynelson
Reviews.Content: I bought two TVs  2 years ago.  The TV works fine except my son says it makes a noise sometimes.  The one we bought my daughter in just a different color the buttons on the TV  quite working soon after we got it. Last year bought a TV from Walmart that is bigger with more to it for about same price and no problems!!!  DON'T BUY CAN FIND SAME DEAL THAT HAS NO PROBLEMS!!!!

Reviews.Title: red flat screen  volume Awful
Reviews.Author: jackie426
Reviews.Content: we went through the trouble of installation, etc.first, the red is a flat red, more importantly the volumewas way too low. We had to return the tv

Reviews.Title: sweet tv!!:)
Reviews.Author: murdock
Reviews.Content: The best$$$ I've ever spent!!!:)This is one awesome tv!!:)differently buy another one!!:):)the picture is perfect!!:)refresh is smoking fast!:)love the color!!_)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: eddie mae holloway
Reviews.Content: My grandchildren were really excited about their new TV. They told all of their little friends about the new TV.

Reviews.Title: sceptre television
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Gouvernet
Reviews.Content: Dreadful. washed out fake colors and "plastic" images.  Tinny sound.I returned it.The Only redeeming factor was white color.

Reviews.Title: Not sure!!
Reviews.Author: J. Trahan
Reviews.Content: I am only writing this review in question of the product. Are all the reviews are in reference to the red Sceptre 23 inchLed-lit 1080 60hz HDTV? I am ordering this tv for my kitchen and plan to have it connected to my direct tv..this is the onlyCompany that make a 23inch or less in red. Feeling I am at a crossroad...loving the color.. Not sure of the product.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: John Batcheller "John"
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is terrible.  I tried to use this as a computer monitor and got terrible picture quality even after i took about an hour to attempt to get the settings correct.  i cant see a place where this screen would be good for anything.  Thank you amazon returns department.

Reviews.Title: 23" sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: Cheryl bashor
Reviews.Content: the frame around the screen is too wide so the tv doesnt fit in the space available for it. word

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: traci t.
Reviews.Content: I got the tv in good timeing for the shipping, but when it was hooked up, my analog channals were fuzzy and it would not hold my digital channals, so I will be returning this item,, it would be nice if they check this stuff befor shipping it out and made sure it works

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Emma
Reviews.Content: I'm 18 anc sucha girly girl everything HAS to be pink !!! I looked everywhere target Walmart the prices were outrageous I was about ready to buy a regular one and paint it pink ! But I found this one so cute!! Baby pink matches my comforter and my daddy mounted it on the wall it looks so good it's so skinny if almost looks like it's inplanted in the wall! Highly the come d for all ages I was a little nervous it would look to kidish but not at all !

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 24 LED Class (23-Inch Viewable) 1080P HDTV
3 x HDMI Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 100 x 100 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: Sceptre E243BV-FHD 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
